mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.realname AS "createByName", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.title, t.attachment, t.org_id, org.name AS "orgName", attachment.attachment_count AS attachmentCount

left join sys_user u on (t.create_by = u.id) left join sys_organization org on (t.org_id=org.id) LEFT JOIN (select count(1) as attachment_count,bill_id from sys_attachment GROUP BY bill_id) attachment on t.id = attachment.bill_id
